name: Deer Giftee
description:
A short, relaxing game made for the 2020 Secret Santa Jam.

Collect flowers and crops as you journey through to the fabled gold coin. There are rumours of deer with magical plant-growing powers.

Warning: Specifically designed around 16:9 and 1920x1080 in particular. Larger resolutions will probably work, but much smaller ones may cause some parts of the screen to be cut-off.

Controls:

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys

Credits:
Most of the art and sound is CC0 (Public Domain) via Open Game Art
The rest is from various Humble Bundle game creator packs

Music is Reborn by Dark Fantasy Studio.
